mapper.select: select from lzh_tag where id in ( select tag_id from lzh_article_tag where article_id = #{articleId} ) and del_flag = 0
select article_id from lzh_article_tag where tag_id = #{tagId}
select sort from lzh_tag order by sort desc limit 0,1
select lat.tag_id as tagId, lt.name as name, count(lat.tag_id) as `value` from lzh_tag lt left join lzh_article_tag lat on lat.tag_id = lt.id where lt.del_flag = 0 group by lat.tag_id
